en.title: Is history twist?
body_lines: In 1972, GG Ponnambalam went to the residence of SJV Selvanayagam and created a strong Tamil United Front - Gajendrakumar - Sridharan's meeting historyThe most important is a milestone.

summary_lines: History twist: In 1972, GG Ponnambalam formed a strong Tamil United Front. This event marked a significant milestone in political history.
